name: Aquila Favonia
desc: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil â€” just like the last heroine who wielded it.
passive: ATK is increased by 20%. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to 100% of ATK and dealing 200% of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.
